text: Prior to the issuance of a building permit or certificate of occupancy for the commercial development, whichever is applicable, the applicant shall certify to the District that the provisions of this part have been satisfied.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 5-76, see notes following § 1-306.31.

For Law 12-275, see notes following § 1-306.31.

DC CODE § 1-306.44

Current through December 11, 2012

part.text: Housing Linkage Requirement of the Housing Element.

heading.catch_text: Issuance of building permit or certificate of occupancy.
